British Prime Minister David Cameron will postpone publication of the Iraq war inquiry report until after the European Union referendum, leading to accusations that he is deliberately delaying controversial announcements.

US Military Personnel To Be Punished For Bombing Doctors Without Borders Hospital In Afghanistan - “I can tell you those individuals most closely associated with it are suspended from duties & referred for administrative action.” spokesman for US central command.

Norway's healthcare ministry on Friday proposed allowing people to legally change their gender without the need for any surgery, hormone treatment or sterilisation, a move hailed by Amnesty International.
